title: Kinda Feudy w/ Special Guests Greg, Tim, & Andy! - Game Showdown
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off polarized sunglasses.

Go to https://bit.ly/AvatarKINDA to listen to Avatar: Braving the Elements on Apple Podcasts or wherever you get your podcasts.

Listen to Kinda Funny Games Showdown on your favorite podcast service and make sure to rate 5 stars! https://cms.megaphone.fm/channel/gameshowdown

Today we're joined by special guests Greg Rice of Day of the Devs, Tim Schafer of Double Fine, and Andrea Rene of What's Good Games!

https://twitter.com/andrearene
https://twitter.com/TimOfLegend
https://twitter.com/GregRicey

Season 1 Ep .8
